title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187: When adding a localization key, it cannot be left blank. If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: In the properties file, when leaving the key blank but providing a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even if the key is left blank.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Set the externalized text in the chart title. 2. Leave the key blank.
